TopicTitle: Where gone the "Write" in Part Tools?

Articles.Content: I'm scratching over a problem in unity export. I'm wondering where the write went and the inspector changed in looks. I have no idea what's happening and I'm totally bad@unity. Anybody know what I might have done? I don't know what I have pressed.
did you set up GameData path for part tools? doesn't have to be in KSP folder, can be anywhere. but the scripts seem to require that to work properly.
Yeah, I had, it was functioning but I should check it and I'll update ya.
sometimes it resets when you change between KSP unity projects. I really don't know what else would cause the problem.
...Tell me how to set that directory again? ._.

Tools->KSP Part Tools ->Setup tab.

just tested it, doesn't give me the same error as yours. worth a shot, but you may need to reinstall Part Tools if setting the gamedata path doesn't do anything.

can also try reverting Unity layout to default or factory. Unity UI runs the same way as game object components and sometimes things get wonky and need a reset.

Edited August 12, 2014 by nli2work

No idea what happened. I started a new project and it worked. I moved my work into my new project and it's back. I'll just shrug it off since I can export again anyway but I'm still curious

BTW none of it worked (thanks)
Let's just blame unity. Even the Blender import is problematic haha.
